sys_script.name: Position - NumberFormat

sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_snc_investor_position</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Position - NumberFormat</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	var currency = {
		decimals: 2,
		postfix: ' '+current.portfolio.currency
		};
	
	var config = {
		performance: {
			decimals: 2,
			postfix: ' %'
		},
		amount: { decimals: 0 },
		value: currency,
		gain: currency,
		costbase: currency,
		price_best: currency,
		price_avg: currency,
		gain: currency
	}
	
	x_snc_devtools.ExecuteBusinessRuleNumberFormat(current,config);

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-12-17 15:06:38</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>4aa38eac8720c550d5900fa90cbb35fb</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Position - NumberFormat</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Investor WORK IN PROGRESS" source="x_snc_investor">8dc0a7971ba37050edf3642aab4bcbe0</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Investor WORK IN PROGRESS">8dc0a7971ba37050edf3642aab4bcbe0</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_4aa38eac8720c550d5900fa90cbb35fb</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-12-17 15:07:50</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before_display</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=4aa38eac8720c550d5900fa90cbb35fb"/></record_update>
